item.title: Aether: A Clean Theme for Hugo
item.description: Today’s web is a frustrating mess of pop-ups, intrusive banners, and ads obstructing the content. I designed aether to be free of all these distractions and simply highlight the content. The result feels more like a native application than a website. Interactions are intuitive, content is the focus, and distractions are omitted. Aether is a Hugo theme for blogs that elevates good writing and photography. If you use Hugo for your blog, give aether a try.
